short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate video chapters with ease : Get a general view, jump straight where you want...Great for music mixes, big podcasts...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of wasting time searching for specific parts of videos on YouTube? VidNav has got you covered! 
Whether you're :

- Looking for a specific song in a mix
- Trying to find out what subjects a podcast will address
- Or just want to skip ahead to the good stuff

VidNav allows you to navigate video chapters with ease. 

-With just one click, jump straight to the most interesting bits. 
-Get an instant understanding of the video's structure. 

- Plus, if you're looking for a specific song, VidNav can search it on YouTube (with just one click again). 

Stop wasting time and energy searching for content inside videos. 
Start using VidNav today!
